name: small closed loop extractor
description: A small machine used for extracting essential oils from organic material producing a high quality extract. It consists of a 6in x 4ft metal tube clamped onto a 5gal steel honey pot. You pack the organic material in the tube, run solvent through the material, then collect the essential oils from the honey pot

use_action.msg: You turn on the small closed loop extractor.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The small closed loop extractor's batteries need more charge.

name: small closed loop extractor (on)
description: A small machine used for extracting essential oils from organic material producing a high quality extract. It consists of a 6in x 4ft metal tube clamped onto a 5gal steel honey pot. You pack the organic material in the tube, run solvent through the material, then collect the essential oils from the honey pot

use_action.msg: You turn off the small closed loop extractor.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The small closed loop extractor's batteries need more charge.

name: large closed loop extractor
description: A large machine used for extracting essential oils from large batches of organic material producing a low quality crude oil. It consists of three 6in x 4ft metal tubes funneled into a 30gal drum thats set horizontally. A series of hoses and tubes come out of the machine going to different valves. It is quite intimidating

use_action.msg: You turn on the large closed loop extractor.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The large closed loop extractor's batteries need more charge.

name: large closed loop extractor (on)
description: A large machine used for extracting essential oils from large batches of organic material producing a low quality crude oil. It consists of three 6in x 4ft metal tubes funneled into a 30gal drum thats set horizontally. A series of hoses and tubes come out of the machine going to different valves. It is quite intimidating

use_action.msg: You turn off the large closed loop extractor.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The large closed loop extractor's batteries need more charge.

name: makeshift essential oil extractor
description: A makeshift extraction system. It's pretty much just a 55gal drum, a pipe to stir the solution, and a faucet at the bottom to drain the extractor. Not the most ideal piece of equipment but it will do for now

name: qualitative filter paper
description: filter paper for seperating solids from liquids. This filter paper has a rating of 2 microns, seperating more solids out than quantitative filter paper but the process takes longer

name: quantitative filter paper
description: filter paper for seperating solids from liquids. This filter paper has a rating of 20 microns, seperating less solids out than qualitative filter paper but the process is much faster

name: vacuum pump
description: A small belt driven mechanical pump capable of achieving a vacuum of -29.99 hg (50 microns)

use_action.msg: You turn on the vacuum pump.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The vacuum pump's batteries need more charge.

name: vacuum pump (on)
description: A small belt driven mechanical pump capable of achieving a vacuum of -29.99 hg (50 microns)

use_action.msg: You turn off the vacuum pump.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The vacuum pump's batteries need more charge.

name: recovery pump
description: A medium sized vacuum pump designed to recover solvent (hydrocarbons) from extracted essential oils

name: butane tank
description: This is a tank of compressed butane. It can be used to extract essential oils from organic material.

name: small vacuum oven
description: A small 0.9 cubic foot vacuum oven used to purge residual solvents out of liquids and solid. Looks kind of like a microwave.

name: filled small vacuum oven
description: A small vacuum oven filled with extract ready to be purged of residual solvents.

use_action.msg: You turn on the vacuum oven and pump.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The vacuum oven's batteries need more charge.

name: small vacuum oven (on)
description: A small vacuum oven filled with extract currently purging out all residual solvents. This process takes about 72hrs.

use_action.msg: The vacuum oven is done purging. Your shatter is ready!
use_action.not_ready_msg: The vacuum oven is still purging.

name: finished small vacuum oven
description: A small vacuum oven filled with extract ready to package up for consumption. WooHoo!

name: (TEMPORARILY OUT OF ORDER)large vacuum oven
description: A large 6ft tall, 7.2 cubic foot vacuum oven used to purge residual solvents out of liquids and solid. Looks kind of like a big refridgerator.

name: (TEMPORARILY OUT OF ORDER)filled large vacuum oven
description: A vacuum oven filled with extract ready to be purged of residual solvents.

use_action.msg: You turn on the vacuum oven and pump.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The vacuum oven's batteries need more charge.

name: (TEMPORARILY OUT OF ORDER)large vacuum oven (on)
description: A vacuum oven filled with extract currently purging out all residual solvents. This process takes about 72hrs.

use_action.msg: The vacuum oven is done purging. Your shatter is ready!
use_action.not_ready_msg: The vacuum oven is still purging.

name: (TEMPORARILY OUT OF ORDER)finished large vacuum oven
description: A large 6ft tall, 7.2 cubic foot vacuum oven used to purge residual solvents out of liquids and solid. The process has finished
